channel.title: Omg please help me! easy fix!
channel.description: so i got my port 43594 set up and it worked with uTorrent but i edited my client.java and searched for "server" and found server = "any ip address.." and i switched it to server = "my.no-ip.info" , i compile both source and client then run source then run client and still get "Error cannot connect to server" i also tested my port and it worked with the no-ip port checker and i tried this on 2 servers..

item.title: Omg please help me! easy fix!
item.dc:creator: @shlomi84 shlomi84
item.description:
@shlomi84 wrote:

u logged out…?

Read full topic

item.title: Omg please help me! easy fix!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

shlomi84:

server works with server = “127.0.0.1” but when i do server = “my.no-ip.info” it doesnt work… and how do i get a .jar file so ppl can go on my server?

you didn’t portforward correctly, 127.0.01 is every1’s localhost.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg please help me! easy fix!
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

zuppers:

I’ve heard some ISP’s stop you from connecting to your own external address. So you might be stuck using 127.0.0.1 or your LAN address e.g 192.168.. they vary.

Why is this the case?

Read full topic

If your set on using utorrent to portforward (bad idea) make sure utorrent is closed before you run your server if it is running it uses the port you have it set to.

item.dc:creator: @drunk3dpkr drunk3dpkr
item.description:
@drunk3dpkr wrote:

[quote=“shlomi84, post:8, topic:440147”]how did u do it… i did everything right, read guides for HOURS and yet… nothing. and even when it works with uTorrent the rsps doesnt work, also i turned off firewall and nothing… can u take a screenshot of ur exact settings like this? :

2yju05k.png826×382

i also tried my computer ip didnt work either…[/quote]

Can you please help me ?!?! i cannot make a source connect to a client i done PF no-ip.duc like everything thats Req now i cant make a client to connect the server i run!!

Read full topic

item.title: Omg please help me! easy fix!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“shlomi84, post:10, topic:440147”]i tried any also before i got that picture. it didnt work[/quote]keep the source port as any and make two client your client and the players client, the players client has your no-ip in it and your client has Localhost (127.0.0.1).

item.title: Omg please help me! easy fix!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“shlomi84, post:8, topic:440147”]how did u do it… i did everything right, read guides for HOURS and yet… nothing. and even when it works with uTorrent the rsps doesnt work, also i turned off firewall and nothing… can u take a screenshot of ur exact settings like this? :

2yju05k.png826×382

i also tried my computer ip didnt work either…[/quote]
Source port is suppose to be “any” destination port is suppose to be the port you’re opening which is 43594. Did it occur to you that 1 of those could have been the problem? Ugh. I posted a tutorial.

Read full topic
